title: Evil Queen

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hand a poisoned apple to another player, poisoning them
- For 2 Malice, consult your magic mirror to learn another player's role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your target is not healed either tonight or tomorrow night, they will die.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Your poison can no longer be cured.
- Your magic mirror can no longer be fooled by frames.

desc:
Post 5421
*"I'll be the fairest in the land!"*
